about_the_game:
The award-winning original soundtrack to Dreamfall Chapters is a stirring musical journey through Stark and Arcadia, the twin worlds of science and magic, by acclaimed composer Simon Poole (Dreamfall, The Secret World, Moons of Madness, Draugen).

This extended and remastered soundtrack features new and original music from the remastered game, Dreamfall Chapters: The Final Cut.

Based in Norway, Simon Poole is an award winning composer, sound designer, producer, and general audio junkie specialising in interactive audio. A graduate of The Liverpool Institute of Performing Arts, Simon is Audio Director at Red Thread Games, and has many critically acclaimed video game titles under his belt, including Dreamfall: The Longest Journey, Age of Conan: Hyborian Adventures, The Secret World, Lego Minifigures Online, The Park, Dreamfall Chapters, My Child Lebensborn, Moons of Madness and Draugen.
